My Achievements: 2nd rank at Jigyasa international problem solving fair competition 1st place in state-level Codeavour 2021 3rd place in national level Tcs rural quiz. 1st place in smart school hackathon 2nd place in the Indian technology and Science festival.

item.title: Sponsor us
item.description: Participating in a competition of this scale needs considerable funds and resources and we would be grateful to receive help from you in any possible way. â€¢There are a number of ways that you can help us. We would be deeply thankful to receive: â€¢Funding for our project (however much you can donate). â€¢Parts or tools to help us make our robot â€¢Giving us access to your social media following or connections to allow us to spread the word about our group
